welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hilter, Germany! Prepare to be charmed by our quaint town and its beautiful natural surroundings. Known for its rich history and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Hilter has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private charters.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
